head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ROMANOFF, REBBETZIN FREDA

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ROMANOFF, REBBETZIN FREDA

block.p: ROMANOFF--Rebbetzin Freda. The Yeshiva Universityfamily is grieved by the passing of the highly respected wife of the late Rabbi Gershon Romanoff, the cherished mother of former Stern College for Women Board member, Dr. Roberta A. (and Dr. Irving) Strauchler, YU scholarship donors; Dr. Elihu (and Libby) Romanoff, and David (and Syndi) Romanoff; who was the revered sister of Rabbi Nathan (and Marion) Zemel, YU Guardians who established a Kollel Fellow ship at RIETS, and of Mildred (and Milton) Klein and Blanche Herberg, a grandmother and great-grandmother. May the entire family be comforted among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Yeshiva University Richard M. Joel, President Norman Lamm, Chancellor Morry Weiss, Chair Board of Trustees

May the entire family be comforted among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Yeshiva University Richard M. Joel, President Norman Lamm, Chancellor Morry Weiss, Chair Board of Trustees
